.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> files, class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Media.Models.ClipTime start, class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Media.Models.ClipTime end, string label, string baseUri) cil managed

Public Sub New (Optional files As IList(Of String) = Nothing, Optional start As ClipTime = Nothing, Optional end As ClipTime = Nothing, Optional label As String = Nothing, Optional baseUri As String = Nothing)

Docs.param: List of files. Required for JobInputHttp. Maximum of 4000 characters each.
Defines a point on the timeline of the input media at which processing will start. Defaults to the beginning of the input media.
Defines a point on the timeline of the input media at which processing will end. Defaults to the end of the input media.

A label that is assigned to a JobInputClip, that is used to satisfy a reference used in the Transform. For example, a Transform can be authored so as to take an image file with the label 'xyz' and apply it as an overlay onto the input video before it is encoded. When submitting a Job, exactly one of the JobInputs should be the image file, and it should have the label 'xyz'.

Base URI for HTTPS job input. It will be concatenated with provided file names. If no base uri is given, then the provided file list is assumed to be fully qualified uris. Maximum length of 4000 characters.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the JobInputHttp class.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.BaseUri : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets base URI for HTTPS job input. It will be concatenated with provided file names. If no base uri is given, then the provided file list is assumed to be fully qualified uris. Maximum length of 4000 characters.
